text: The 1970 UCI Track Cycling World Championships were the World Championship for track cycling. They took place in Leicester, United Kingdom in 1970.World Championship Track Cycling 2014-1893 Eleven events were contested, 9 for men (3 for professionals, 6 for amateurs) and 2 for women. ==Medal summary== {| |- style="background:#ccc;" | colspan=7 | Men's Professional Events |- |Men's sprint | Gordon Johnson || Sante Gaiardoni || Leijn Loevesijn |- | | Hugh Porter || Lorenzo Bosisio || Charly Grosskost |- |Men's motor-paced | Ehrenfried Rudolph || Theo Verschueren || Piet de Wit |- style="background:#ccc;" | colspan=7 | Men's Amateur Events |- | |Niels Fredborg || Harry Kent || Anton Tkáč |- |Men's sprint | Daniel Morelon || Peder Pedersen || Gérard Quintyn |- | | Xaver Kurmann || Ian Hallam || Viktor Bykov |- |Men's team pursuit | Günter Haritz Peter Vonhof Hans Lutz Günther Schumacher || Thomas Huschke Heinz Richter Herbert Richter Manfred Ulbricht || Stanislav Moskvin Vladimir Kuznetzov Viktor Bykov Vladimir Semenets |- |Men's motor-paced |Cees Stam || Horst Gnas || Antonio Cerda |- |Men's tandem | Jürgen Barth Rainer Muller || Hans-Jürgen Geschke Werner Otto || Gérard Quintyn Daniel Morelon |- style="background:#ccc;" | colspan=7 | Women's Events |- |Women's sprint |Galina Tsareva |Galina Ermolaeva |Valentina Savina |- |Women's individual pursuit |Tamara Garkuchina |Raisa Obodovskaya |Beryl Burton |} ==Medal table== ==See also== * 1970 UCI Road World Championships ==References== Track cycling Category:International cycle races hosted by England Category:UCI Track Cycling World Championships by year Category:1970 in track cycling Category:20th century in Leicestershire Category:Sport in Leicester
title: 1970 UCI Track Cycling World Championships
